info.name: Archlinux and ArchAssault Dark
info.description: A dark theme for the various archlinux.org domains and archassault.org
info.additionalInfo:
Version: 1.7.1

Version History:
  1.7.2 - Add aur.archlinux.org to the aur4.archlinux.org section now that they have merged
  1.7.1 - Update to include aur4 git info pages
  1.7.0 - Replace the aur4 logo with one that has a transparent bg, and set the close button background transparent
  1.6.1 - Add support for aur4.archlinux.org
  1.6.0 - Set the secondary wiki table colour
  1.5.0 - Add proper support for bugs.archassault.org and wiki.archassault.org
  1.4.0 - Add dark background to the wiki dispute box
  1.3.0 - Add dark background to the wiki edit box
  1.2.0 - More font brightness tweaking and tweak the shade of blue in headings
  1.1.0 - Brighten some font colours that couldn't be seen against the background
  1.0.0 - Initial release

Theme is based on the many Arch Linux Dark 2013 (pdq) themes

data.title: Is better to highlight this link?
Everything is fine except warning/additional note section.
